form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/6/2023 Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R400.2 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT (For use under Section 245, 249 or the proviso to Section 203(a)(7) of the Immigration and Nationality Act or Section 13 of the Act of September 11, 1957) FEE STAMP FILE NO. APPLICANT FOR BENEFITS OF SECTION LAW Immigrant Nonimmigrant (Type) visa issued at on (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check appropriate box) An immigrant visa is immediately tallable to me: A. other than as a refugee B. as a refugee I have resided in the United States continuously since C. prior to June 30, 1948 D. prior to July 1, 1924. 2. My name is (First) (Middle) (Last) My alien registration number is WOON YEF WONG A14 579 720 I have also used the following names (Married women must show maiden name and names by prior marriages, if any) 3. I reside in the United States at: (Apt. No.) (No. and Street) (City) (State) 1227 W 121 LOS ANGELES CAL 4. Date of Birth Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) I am now a citizen of (Country) 7-22-1913 CHINA 5. Height Weight Eyes Hair Complexion Marks or Scars 6. Parents' Names 5 ft. 2 in. 120 lbs. BLACK WONG CHUN LAN (F.) 7. I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) HONCLULU HAWAII 5-12-65 CHOW FUNG Ho (N) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) as a (Visitor, student, U.S. citizen, stowaway, immigrant, etc.) PLANE PAI 100 IMMIGANT 8. I have resided at the following places: (Applicants who check Block A or B of Item I must furnish all places of residence from date five years prior to entry into the United States, up to and including the present time, listing present address first. Applicants who check Block C or D of Item 1 must show all places of residence during the last five years, listing present address first.) State From To Street and No. City Province Country Month Year Month Year 1294 A CAL USA AUG Present time 1227 w 121 MAY 1215 AND 14/1 1465 9. I have been employed at the following places during the past five years (include all United States and foreign employment) Type of work From FOR CVF Full name and address of employer I did Month Year Month Year Present time 10. I do do not intend to seek gainful employment in the United States. 11. I am am not married. (If you are married give the following:) widow a. Date of marriage b. Date and place of birth of spouse decended 2-24-1931 24-14-1931 CHINA 7-22-1913 c. Name of spouse and last address at which you and your spouse resided together Name Address (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (Town or City) (State) From (Month and Year) To (Month and Year) d. Number of times I have been married, including this marriage e. Number of times my spouse has been married f. Number of children / 3 g. The following members of my family are also applying for status as permanent residente. SONAwar HING PO DAUGHTER FOIA (b)(6) h. Name, date and place of birth and present address of each child: win HINE Po 2-28-45 CHINA FOIA (b)(6) Form I-485 (Rev. 12-1-65) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service
